results.definition: being or feeling set or kept apart from others
examples: could not remain the isolated figure he had been

results.definition: under forced isolation especially for health reasons
marked by separation of or from usually contiguous elements
examples: little isolated worlds, as abruptly disjunct and unexpected as a palm-shaded well in the Sahara

results.definition: remote and separate physically or socially
examples: tiny isolated villages remote from centers of civilization
